content.text: I love sci fi space adventures! I think they are so creative and imaginative.
I'm not a big fan of sci fi. I prefer real life stories.
I can understand that. I like to escape into a different world sometimes.
I like to learn about the world around me.
I do too. I like to travel and learn about different cultures.
I'm not able to travel much. I'm afraid of flying.
I'm afraid of heights. I don't like being up high.
I'm afraid of a lot of things. I'm afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
I'm not afraid of failing. I'm afraid of success.
Why are you afraid of success?
I'm afraid of what it will do to my life. I'm afraid I won't be able to handle it.
You'll figure it out. You're a smart person.
I know I'm right. You're going to do great things.
